attributes.action: Allow more than 15 people at a wedding.
attributes.additional_details: To discuss this and come to a conclusion that it should be allowed. Compare this to full gymnasium which is allowed or a flight from Cyprus to the uk i was personally on with 100 plus strangers
attributes.background: Allow a congregation of at least 50 close friends and family to attend a wedding

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increase Number of Guests Permitted at Weddings, according to Venue Capacity
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329339

Permit larger weddings based on guests testing negative for COVID-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550498
